title: monastery
review: this is located in clement town about a km inside from main sahranpur highway. the access is through cant area. this monastery is located inside the Tibetan colony and adjoining Rajaji national park. the area is clean and well maintained with lawn. entry is free. A mini shopping arcade inside the complex sell many Tibetan articles. Inside the Tibetan colony there are many small and clean restaurants catering Tibetan foods.   overall a nice place to spend a couple of hours. This also gives a fair idea about Tibetan people, their culture and religious ( budhist ) belief.

title: Good and peaceful place
review: Temple is situated near Graphic Era University and is a large temple. Very serene and very relaxing place, one can easily meditate. Interior of the temple is very nice. Thukpa and Momos at nearby street food is very good.

title: Nice temple in a park to walk easy through
review: The temple is located with an impressive statue of the god of rain (Indra) in a park close to the city center. The temple is a part of the monastery and you see the monks passing by. But you can not enter the inner monastery where they are living. It is not an impressive temple, but Dehradun is small and the temple size correlates perfectly with. Visiting time is approximately 1 h. Visiting the shop nearby is not really worth.

title: Good place to visit
review: This is good place to visit in Dehradoon. We get peace while remaining in temple.One should visit this temple

title: Refreshing and peaceful place
review: Nice peaceful abode.The nature and the temple soothes the soul mind and your body.Very nicely developed and maintained.The shops around the place are worth visiting.The food and snacks are good.Lively yet peaceful place.

title: Nice and lovely place
review: This is located in Clement Town area of Dehradun near to ISBT Dehradun. It is nice lovely place and worship place of Tibetian people. It is a three storey temple with photos of Lord Buddha. There is also a buddhist school on other side of temple. Park on front of temple is well maintained.

title: Serene... Nice
review: Ideal location for a peaceful temple. Beautiful, nice but don't go without a fixed vehicle. You'll have no vehicle to go by. Go only if you like Buddhist temple...

title: Very Lovely Place
review: Go to this temple for peace of mind and happiness. This is very beautiful. This lovely temple becomes known once in its entire life.

title: Serene place
review: one of the off beat places amongst an area largely inhabited by Tibetan refugees, the temple is very charming and tranquil. its located on the other side of the airport almost a journey for 45 mins, hence if its not in your route, you might want to skip it. but if you have the time then will definitely recommend a visit.

title: One time
review: It's very nice peaceful place,we have visited there before 3 days with 4 family, it's a very big temple, around the temple it's a huge neat and clean lawn,i felt there sense of mental peace,kids also enjoyed there a lot

title: Peaceful serene
review: Come here if you want to spend a quiet peaceful day under the sun on vast green lawn.

title: Extremely beautiful
review: This is an extremely beautiful and mesmerising place - a temple in Dehradun which one must visit when coming to Dehradun. The air and aura is fresh. Must visit

title: Good Visit
review: Nice place to visit, one must in Dehradun. Culture depiction is great. nice monuments, about 1 hour from complete visit.

title: Serene place between Urban city
review: This place is a must visit if you're looking to spend a spiritual time in Dehradun. I visited in the evening time as the temple was closing, it was quite peaceful and cafes near this temple are must visit.

title: Peaceful
review: One would really feel very peaceful after reaching there. Though it’s quiet far from the city, but easily accessible. There is all means of transportation available to reach there from the main city. There is a Tibetan market as well outside the premises, where people can do some Tibetan shopping and also try Tibetan cuisine.

title: The most peaceful place on Earth!
review: This place is a bit far from the city-centre but it's totally, totally worth the effort to go to this place. The moment you enter through the gate, something happens to you. You start feeling very positive and peaceful.

title: Quiet & Tranquil
review: This place is a bit out of the town, on the way to Musoorie. The place is very quiet and peaceful. It has beautiful carvings and motifs. The doors of the temple also have intricate carvings on it. There is huge bell in front of the temple. On this campus there is also a Buddhist theology institute which was opened by the Dalai Lama. A nice place to visit.

title: Peaceful Place
review: Budha Temple is a very peaceful place in Dehradun, not too far from ISBT. It is a perfect place to visit on weekdays. A bit crowded on Sundays. They have lots of shops, restaurants and canteen with good North Indian and Tebitian food options.

title: Buddhist Temple
review: I went their in February 2019, and I love to visit again. This place is very calm and they have maintained it very well.

title: Presenting a panaromic view of Buddhist culture
review: A cool place to relax from the hustle of city. The temple and surrounding structures and carvings on it give a very good view of Buddhisty culture. The surrounding garden presents a cool relaxing atmosphere.. A little market inside the complex gives to souvnir and good snacks.

title: Calm and Peaceful place
review: Its is very calm and peaceful on the mountains. you will see good view of mountain. I suggest to climb the mountain near buddhist temple where you will find Buddha idol. the view from there is amazing.

title: A must if Buddhist temple is your thing
review: Not sure why this place does not feature in many of the tours n travels itineraries. A nice quiet place and very well kept. Beautiful architecture work, would recommend to anyone visiting Dehradun.

title: Picturesque and very well kept
review: An excellent place to visit. It is green and very well maintained. The residence of the trainee monks on the right of the main compound is itself worth a visit.

title: Good family time
review: The Buddhist temple in the city is the best place to hang out with family. Specifically during winters when it is sunny

title: Nature in Natural
review: A where you can find peace of life peace of mind

title: An Oasis of Serenity
review: A serene and beautiful place to spend some time while in Dehra Dun. Forming part of a Buddhist Monastery and School, the temple is housed in clean and green surroundings and is a good place to rejuvenate amidst the hustle and bustle of Dehra Dun. Be sure to ask about and observe Buddhist artists working on intricate, colorful as well as awesome paintings in one of the buildings on campus. The statues of Buddha and Padmasambhava are absolutely gorgeous. I am glad I went there. There is no entry fee, and parking is available. Not easy to find as it is tucked away at one end of Clement Town, on the outskirts of the city.

title: Calmness
review: There are different temples in this area, it takes a whole day to visit this place. A camera is not allowed inside. Also, try roadside food near this place they are small stalls but amazing tasty food. this place probably the cleanest area in Dehradun.

title: Serene place
review: The Mindrolling Monastery is located around 9 kms from Dehradun city in a place called Clement Town. The monastery hosts a main Stupa with a place for prayers, and several icons on Buddha and Buddhism all around. We spent close to 1 hour in this place. A good place to spend time as a pilgrim, as a tourist and as a photo lover.

title: #Buddhist fam place
review: I was visit here so many times every time we get new attractions here.

title: Majestic yet Serene & Calm
review: Mindrolling Monastery or Tibetan Buddist Temple is 9Kms from Dehradun Station at place called Clement Town. One can easily get a Vikram(Auto Rickshaws) to this place for 10-20 bucks a seat.

title: Good to visit
review: It's a Tibetan Buddhist temple on saharanpur road. Nicely maintained and very calm place. Plan for 1-2 hrs if you enjoy peaceful places.

title: My recent visit here
review: We visited this place while our stay in Dehradun. It was great place. Lush green campus with a large statue of Gautam Buddha is superb. The campus consists of well maintained garden. Car parking area is also available here.

title: Peaceful
review: This is a Tibetan Monastry in Dehradun with a nice garden and a very calm peaceful atmosphere. You can go there to just take a walk and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere.

title: Outing
review: It is good place to spent your sunday outing

title: Pray for longing and wellness
review: This place is so beautiful that you cannot resist yourself sitting and just lost in nature. Pray here for your long age  and NEVER EVER CROSS THE STUPA FROM THE ANTI CLOCK SIDE. If you want to do the prayer ask anyone about the AMRIT AYU MANTRA AND TARA DEVI MANTRA.

title: Peacful place
review: This is nearby Graphic era university. It is a peaceful place where you can let your mind relax.  Huge statue of lord buddha.

title: Real peace of mind
review: One of the few place in dehradun to visit for full day when you search of peace of mind within the city limit

title: Serene
review: It's nice and peaceful. Things to look around and observe. Loved our time here.

title: Budhist monastery
review: If you are visiting as tourist then you will find it good. Nice big Budha temple at the centre and other temple. When we reached there by the time it was dark so can't read about the history. Cool calm ambience but you can't mediate as locals come there for a walk. It's approachable place through vehicle . Nice tibetan market  outside monastery. Sovenier shops available along with food joint. Water /washroom available. No fee for entry.

title: Calm n relaxing spiritual place
review: Full of positive energy...buddha temple n monastery is a must visit in Dehradun.. The campus is green n has a lot of place for kids to play around..The canteen is famous for its mouth-watering momos..

title: Worth the visit.
review: Beautiful place. One of the best bhudda temples I have seen so far. A must visit when in Dehradun.

title: Peaceful Place.
review: When you visit mussoorie and want to stay away from crowd this is the escapist paradise.

title: Splendid! Mindrolling Monastery.
review: What a marvel tucked away in Dehradun! Absolutelu serene and one of the largest Buddhist structures that I have ever seen. Must visit Mindrolling Monastery.

title: Feel inner peace
review: My friend who stays there took me to this place. Nice place to visit. Felt peace deep inside. This place also has a garden.

title: Excellent place to visit
review: This is a Buddhist Tibbetan Monestry. Well maintained. Nice lawns. very quite surroundings. Inside the temple it is very Calm and beautiful. There are large number of of Shops by Tibbetans with their special items. Worth a visit for all.

title: Must Visit it if you are in Dehradun
review: This place is good, monks are here who used to do there prayers here and many good stores for shopping. Big statues and good place to capture many pictures.

title: Peaceful
review: Visiting Budha temple was a great experience. It brings you closer to your soul and made you thoughtful. This place brought peace to my mind after long hectic life of city, Delhi.

title: Mesmerizing n Holy...
review: A must place to visit while in Dehradun.

title: Tibetan temple
review: The Temple provides you solace amidst chaos. The place is worth visiting once but its an effort to reach there. The approach roads are shabby, pot-holed however the area around the temple is clean. Being a tourist attraction, the government should have maintained the roads leading to it. Once inside the temple, you get a breeze of fresh air and calmness.

title: Serene and Calm
review: I visited this place few years back. And it was still the same.. beautiful, calm, cool and clean and above all simple..

title: Beautiful and Peaceful
review: It is also known as Mindrolling Monastry. If you are in Dehradun, then this place is a must visit. It is beautiful and peaceful. Do check the timings of this place before you plan your visit i.e. the open and close timings. Entry and Parking  are free. No charges.

title: AWESOME & CLEAN PLACE
review: Visit to this Budhist tibetian temple is a must.A serene & clean temple. All the buildings and statues are huge & built according to Budhist pagoda law. At the entrance to the temple there are boards dipicting Budhist philosophy. Please read every board to understand the Budhist philosophy. Inside temple there are beutiful carvings- idols & budha statue. Please spend 2-3 hours , you will enjoy & appreciate the place. There is a small Budhist monestry like the one in Lhasa.

title: A Place of Peace and Spirituality
review: If you want a place where you spend quality time with your friends or your family then Buddha Temple is best place for it, it has large open garden where you can sit and enjoy beauty of the Buddha temple and its architecture also the clean and cool environment gives relaxation to your eyes and mind.

title: Awesome place
review: It's a beautifully done up place ..an ideal tourist attraction...well maintained with beautiful garden .. huge statues of Lord Budha and very calm n serene

title: Peace & Spiritual
review: An extremely serene and clean place, the Buddhist Temple is a must visit if you are in Dehradun. You can spend some quiet moments here and the peace and spirituality that this place exudes is really amazing. It is not too hard to reach from the main city, and there is ample space to sit & just experience the entire place.

title: Buddhist Temple
review: I visited The Tibetan Buddhist Temple with my friend. It is a very quiet and good place to visit. Tourist visiting Doon valley must visit the temple.

title: Calm and beautiful
review: A must visit of mussoorie, provides serene beauty, calm atmosphere and beautifully made tibetan monastery. Very nicely managed and a treat to see.

title: Beautiful serene place
review: A must  visit for all residing and visiting doon......i love this place.... great for an evening outing

title: A nice place especially for Buddhists.
review: Ambience is really great to spend time to meditate.& enjoy the surrounding.I will recommend to visit the place in the forenoon or in the evening.

title: Visit to Tibetan Monastery
review: This a Tibetan Monastery situated in Clement town cantonment area. It has a huge Tibetan Stupa which is visible from miles. Inside the stupa ia a Tibetan temple. very neat and clean and very peaceful. It has beautiful big lawns all around. But you are not allowed to take your eatables. There is a small cafeteria. If you are a tourist than this is one of the tourist attractions of Dehradun where you can spend 2/3 hrs.

title: Nice
review: While coming back from mussorie we told cab driver to show some good visiting places in Dehradun. He took us here. Very peaceful and quiet and nice place to see

title: Great place to visit
review: Address listed was incorrect, please double check before you go. I submitted a request to update it.

title: Buddhist monastery, Dehradun
review: The monastery is worth visiting. However it is not so well kept typical to such places of worship. There is some shopping and snack bar, not worth mentioning. To see this alone, one need to come.

title: Symbolic of serenity and Peace...Must visit
review: This Budhist temple is at clement town ...though the Google address can mislead you at times....it is a must visit for its surreal kind of environs and the different atmosphere...very well maintained....

title: must visit place while in Dehradun
review: very good place to visit, will feel inner peace. Will get to taste good momos and noodles in near by area

title: Peaceful
review: The buddhist temple at Dehradun has a unique calm about it though there are hundreds of visitors around. The lawns are well maintained. The walls of the main prayer hall having painting with history of buddha.

title: One of the Top attraction of Dehradun to experience Tibetan Culture
review: A Monastery next to Old Buddha Temple of Clementown area of Dehradun situated 1.5 kms inside of main Saharanpur - Dehradun Highway towards Graphic Era University and Army area. A nice place to visit, pray, sit and relax also. If you are lucky you can experience their worshiping ceremony. Some small shops offers related items of Buddha/ Tibetan tradition also.

title: Beautiful and moving
review: Worth visiting and spending a couple of hours to absorb the stillness of the place. Travel in the morning to avoid the hot sun.

title: Beautiful Monastery
review: If you are travelling towards Mussoorie, pls. try to visit this Buddhist temple/monastery. It is really worth visiting. You gonna love it. There are plenty of food joints near Monastery. You can try momos, Tibetan local food etc. The Monastery is so neat, clean and well maintained.

title: Must Visit Place in Dehradun
review: Best thing I have seen in Dehradun.

title: Different World of Spirituality all around
review: I traveled Tibetan Buddhist Temple last month , a few miles away from city center took us in different world of Spirituality .  Felt himself in abode of Peacefulness , Calmness  &   pureness with blend of Natural Beauty . Buddhism at full swing with peace of mind. Buddhist monk chanting holy mantra & ritual. Spent some of the unforgettable moments of life in the garden of Buddhism .

title: Big and Clean Monastery
review: It is a beautiful monastery. Unfortunately the entry to the temples was closed. It also offers good options of food and shopping.

title: Peaceful place
review: Peaceful and nice place with lot shrines. It was first visit to Buddha temple and I felt like a eternal peace there. Apart from peace, you will find picturesque idols. In short it is a good place to have some peaceful time.

title: Nice buddha temple
review: It was a very nice Buddhist temple, it was very calm & quite in there.

title: Peaceful and Tranquil
review: This is a beautiful place. Inside a Tibetan settlement, housing schools and colleges, as well as monasteries, you see young lamas around, going about their business.

title: Great place to visit
review: It is best place to visit in Dehradun. It have excellent exhibition of Tibetan culture. You will definitely feel peace of mind

title: The serene and tempting surroundings
review: The place is beautiful and serene.

title: Charming
review: Peaceful and charming place. Visited the monastery on the last day of their examination. Upsetting when visitors do not follow rules...all seem to be chatting and taking selfies and making so much noise. Hope the young monks managed to answer their questions well.

title: beautiful place, must visit if around
review: beautiful Tibetan Buddhist temple,

title: Trip
review: It is a very nice place to hangout with friends and family also you can get food nearby and shopping destinations also the clothes and the shoes quality in nearby shops is very much perfect and everything about the atmosphere is very positive

title: Good place to visit in Dehradun
review: Very neat and clean place. You get very positive vibes here.The environment is really nice. You may also do some shopping here.

title: Monastery in Dehradun.
review: This Buddhist temple and Monastery is in Dehradun, not in Mussoorie. The listing in TripAdvisor needs correction.

title: Peaceful environment
review: The surrounding of this place is very peaceful.It is far away from the citylife.

title: Great tibetan temple. we loved the atmosphere inside and outside
review: We enjoyed the trip to the Tibetan Buddhist temple. Peaceful place which we truly enjoyed. Lots of spirituality around us.

title: A must see Tibetan Buddhist temple close to Library Chowk in Happy Valley
review: The 1st Tibetan Buddha temple built in India after the Tibetan settled as refugees in 1959 after Chinese invasion. Has colorful paintings on the walls & ceilings, prayer wheels, colorful prayer flags, meditation halls & huge idol of Buddha & Dalai Lama. Offers beautiful views of Himalayan range & Doon valley on a clear day. Located 3 Kms from Library Cgowk, approx Cab fare Rs 250 for return journey.

title: Grand new Tibetan buddhist temple.
review: Tranquil, large, peaceful, and beautiful. A large tower featuring shrines and several art pieces in the grounds.

title: Peaceful Monastery
review: This place is located in Clement town in DEHRADUN suburb. There are two monasteries adjacent to each other.  This temple is spread across large area with garden on both sides.  Lot of places to sit around the temple. It was colder than the city as it's closer to the hills. In the evening,  the light added more beauty to its ambience.  Overall nice place  to spend some time with friends n family. In the premises are some shops and a small tibetian restaurant.

title: Nice family trip
review: Very good place to see in dehradun.  Very near to ISBT dehradun.  Very calm & nice place.  Must watch.  ...

title: Sunil Kumar
review: It's awesome place every traveller must visit. I have visited twice and find a very different spiritual experience every time.

title: Beautiful and Peaceful
review: Calm, Beautiful and Peaceful. My friemd who lives in dehradun took me there, and I can say that it is a must visit place if you are in dehradun. I enjoyed my time here.

title: FASCINATING & PEACFUL BUDDHHA TEMPLE
review: Well , Bhudhha Temple situated in Clementown area is very nice and peaceful place to hang out with family and friends. The Inside area of the temple is so peaceful and it fills you with lots of positive energy. The lush green grass in front is ideal for relaxing. The restaurant is also very nice, specially noodles

title: Small peaceful and great views
review: Nice temple. Lots of people come here. Views are stunning with mountains visible. The temple is quiet and peaceful. Lots of people live nearby and great to see so much life and energy. Can't say more but go here expecting nothing and come away feeling a little nicer and better. The camera will be useful for sure

title: Nice Place
review: Well maintained area. It is having a very good campus area. peaceful area.

title: Peaceful place
review: Wonderful architecture and peaceful atmosphere with surrounding by nature. What else you looking for? Must visit!

title: Serine and peaceful place
review: The temple and the statues there are enormous.  There are a lot of monkeys there so don't have food in hand.  It is a beautiful place to stroll through.  Please respect the temple and the monks who are there.

title: Immense peace!!!
review: The Budhdha Temple is amazing. There is an immense peace in this temple. Very sceneric and relaxing place.

title: Buddha Temple
review: Very beauiful and holy place. You can get peace here. Just go there and sit there for a moment you will start feeling the love of nature and blessings of lord buddha. The architect is very nice and beautiful. Ypu will get enough space to park your vehicle there. You go inside the temple and feel the air.

title: Buddha temple from the exterior
review: Reached around 9.30 am i n the morning. Were informed that the temple will not open till 12 noon. The board outside however had a timing from 9 to 12.

title: peaceful with great views
review: this is in cinematown area. it can be reached from the Library Chowk side after a long walk  Well maintained and very clean. good to visit for sprituality

title: Exploring different culture with fun
review: Everything is plus at this place.

title: mesmerising!
review: when you visit this place you notice neat and clean aura and surroundings, located in cinematown and well connected from ISBT.

title: very well maintained
review: this tibetan temple in dehradun is very well maintained and a nice outing . one can spend about 2 hours looking around admist thick jungles

title: Tibetan Buddhist Temple
review: Tibetan architecture.

title: Serene Quiet Place
review: It is  well located Buddhist Monastery. The sculptures are beautiful. The serene atmosphere is helpful

title: Serene spiritual place
review: Visited the Tibetan Buddhist temple during the Mussoorie trip"

title: A serene place
review: The Tibetan Buddhist temple, located in Dehradun, is an apt location for those who need to spend some time in a serene setting. The aesthetically built colorful monuments provide a visual feast. We reached there in the evening and spent more than one hour there. There is a small township adjacent to the temple complex where the Tibetan Buddhists live. Those who visit Dehradun should never miss this attraction.

title: quaint, serene place to visit. DO NOT MAKE NOISE AT THIS TEMPLE
review: well located in the happy valley. a good explanation to the history of the temple that Dalai Lama himself visited n blessed this place.

title: visit to buddhist temple, mussoorie
review: Calm and quiet place to be one with your mind and heart. You can chant in the temple. Very scenic place. You can spend an hour here.  You can walk down from library chowk - may reach faster against the traffic jam.

title: Nice place
review: Have very good campus. Temple is surrounded by a small market and good lawn. Good to visit for sprituality.

title: Calm quiet place
review: This is a serene and very peaceful place.

title: Tibetan settlement, beautiful, serene
review: Happy Valley is a large Tibetan settlement in Mussorie. It also houses the IAS training academy of India.

title: Relax your Mind !
review: I have lived in this place (Dehradun) for all of my childhood. I have been to the Tibetan temple many number of times  and have always found it soothing, relaxing and mind calming.

title: Best of buddhist temple in dehradun
review: Better known locally as Buddha Temple Clementown. It's excellent for any traveler visiting Dehradun.

title: Peaceful and Very Beautiful Palce
review: The Tibetan Buddhist temple is one of Dehradun’s famous landmarks and is known for its beautiful architecture, impressive interiors and peaceful surroundings.

title: Nice !
review: The place is a perfect case study on 'How to Manage a Sacred Site'. The place was recently build may some two decade ago. The landscape planing, monastery and the small shopping facility transformed this once Tibetan refugee   shanty town into a favorite destination in Dehradun. Worth visiting !

title: Divine visit
review: I have visited this place a couple of timesand every time it gives a similar feel , calmness . Apart from this a good place to enjoy the tibbatian food and see their culture .

title: peaceful and divine
review: divinity resides here and you will feel it for sure, can feel the vibes here soothing my soul and taking best out of me

title: Holy Place
review: Green Lavish Lawn actually attracts a lot.

title: peace full environment !
review: good place to visit if you are looking for some peace in life.

title: Peace @ serenity
review: Very calm & soothing atmosphere. Very well maintained. Everything was very neat @ clean. People are very helping.

title: Touch of Buddha
review: Tibetan Buddha temple in the Clement town of Dehradun is a state if art structure. Huge Buddha statue with golden effects, flames out of hundreds of butter lamps, the Buddhist chants in the background make it a soul calming place.   It same some small eating joints and shops around it.

title: Prayer and the Stupa
review: This place is like other tibetian budhdhist temple. The stupa is grand. This holy place can make you calm

title: Peaceful and serene place
review: The place is peacefull. Plan a visit on a Sunday bcos on Sunday visitor are allowed to go on the top of stupa

title: Simply Sevine
review: Its simply eye catchy and peaceful temple and a outstanding place to find yourself satisfied. The outer appearance is just tremendous and has three storey Buddha temple. Idols and sculptures are surely considerable. It also has a massive garden wherein people can sit down with their family and pals.

title: Serene and Stunning
review: Stunning is the word. Peacefully and well maintained. Wear comfortable sports shoes or slippers so you can walk around comfortably and enjoy the serene seneic place!!

title: Great Experience
review: It was a wonderful experience to visit the Buddhist monastery. The area is neat and well maintained. The visit inside the monastery was a beautiful spiritual experience.

title: Amazing view
review: The Buddha statue is just amazingly tall and architecture of the temple is totally worth your while. If u r not into devotions and prayers, just visit the place see the statue

title: Good Place to Visit
review: A tourist must visit this place & enjoy its peace, cool & calm atmosphere.

title: The Great Stupa
review: This is a truly awesome place to visit. It will blow your mind still your Heart and fill your life with trancendant vibrations bringing you good fortune now and in the hereafter. The Dalai Lama has said that even to hear about this extraordinary place means that one will avoid a lower rebirth. It is mind blowing in many ways the workmanship is epic the art is detailed and colourful in the extreme and it all points in one direction..within. A huge statue of Guru Rinpoche is also there the whole place is..well just go there and be quiet for a bit see how you feel.

title: The Good and the Not So!
review: Superb location about 30 min drive from Dehradun. My second visit in 5-6 years.  Tranquility and reverence broken somewhat by several high school busses of students. Albeit a must visit place. Allow yourself at least an hour to enter and walk about the grounds.

title: Great place to visit
review: This Holy place located at clemen town is a great place to visit to know about BUDDHISM.There are various shops inside the same campus but are quite expensive.

title: Easily best place in entire dehradun
review: After coming out of bed and having breakfast in the hotel, we headed for the Buddhist temple. Took a cab to the place and easily accessible. We left the cab well before temple and strolled the market. Had nice steamed momos and tea in one small Restro.

title: Palce to Visit
review: I have visited the Buddha Temple in Dehradun , which is located in Clementown, I am not sure of having in Mussorie, it  is hardly 5 KM from this Hotel

title: its really peaceful and beautiful place to visit
review: Here you can feel more peaceful and beautiful place to visit so must visit once you reach Dehradun..

title: A peaceful Holy place
review: I with my wife visited this place on 23-11-2017 at 2.30 PM after visiting Sai Baba Temple.

title: Buddha of awe size
review: The place is beautiful with flower gardens and an awe sized Buddha rising to the sky.

title: Go here if you are a religious/touristy place fan.
review: A new Tibetan place of worship, the dance inside the hall was superb to watch, but the structures themselves aren't tibetan, but rather replicas. The message of the space is beautiful.

title: Here we feel that we come in Tibbat.
review: It is buddh temple make in Tibetan style. Here we feel that we really come in tibbat country. Peaceful and nice place to visit.

title: Love this place
review: A cool, quiet atmosphere around.

title: Marvellous
review: It is also known as world peace stupa.i was spellbound to visit this place.  What beauty. A white stupa in midst of large green lawn. U can sit for hours together delving In its beauty. There are fat did joints inside and outside the site.  There is also small market place inside and outside the site. U can take ball for kids to play in the lawns. It's really a peaceful place to rejuvenate the senses.  Food is gud.  Take water along as otherwise u've to buy bottles.  As Sun is directly overhead here..u can take hat along. There are timings so better confirm before visiting on Wong time.

title: Beautiful Buddhist Temple
review: We visited this temple located amidst the Tibetan colony in Deradun.Since it was afternoon the gate of the main  temple was locked and hence we could not go inside .However from outside it looked beautiful and decent .Architectural design was as per Tibetan  Buddhist traditional design,  very colourful and captivating.   Atmosphere inside the precinct was somber, serene and peaceful.Young monks ,who appeared to be students of the Tibetan  Buddhist school, were seen moving from  one building to the other.Flowers gardens enhanced the beauty of the place.Local  lamas,Buddhists worship Lord Buddha here in this temple.Many tourists while in Dehradun visit this temple .

title: Surreal place of beauty
review: A must visit for every visitor to dehradun. Marked by sprawling lawns, you can sit down and enjoy the surroundings. If you visiting at the right time of the day, the ongoing prayers will leave you feeling relaxed.

title: beautiful place to visit in Mussoorie
review: the view from the temple is beautiful and the atmosphere around the temple is  peaceful and relaxing. small Tibet in Mussoorie

title: Nice place to visit
review: This place is out of town and takes about half an hour (by taxi) to get there.

title: Good peaceful place , but too faar
review: We were very tyred so we coudnt enjoy that place , as drive was too long . Nicely built , well clean and maintained .

title: amazing place to visit
review: Buddha temple is a must visit attraction in dehradun.

title: Huge clean temple
review: For religious point of view its a great place to be, though a bit far from the main city (15+ km). One can relax peacefully here after visiting the temple complex. The backdrop of the temple is just so beautiful. Also, one can buy soveniers or do local shopping inside the temple complex shops. Else one can go out and try local momos (very tasty).

title: Jaw dropping
review: We went here one night after dinner.  What an amazing experience.  The grounds are very well kept, monkeys running around the property.  Big temple and awesome experience.   Don't miss this one.

title: Nice, peaceful place to vist
review: This monastery is though away from town, it's worth a visit. It closes by 7:00 Pm so make ur plan accordingly.

title: For Peace Lovers
review: Such calm place to help you discover yourself.

title: great heritage
review: a place for seeing buddhist architecture and spending time with family and friends.....grt park availavle for the same and also a mini market as well

title: Should definately visit the temple
review: I visited the temple with famiily. It was a  nice experience. There are lot of space where u can sit and spend some time or meditate. Peaceful place

title: Beautiful., blissful and peaceful
review: Very beautiful temple with wow architecture and lush green gardens. Loved the atmosphere.  I had to wait a lot to get into the stupa as the opening times did not match the notice. Should chk timing before you go.

title: Spiritually soothing
review: Do visit this place if you visit Dehradun or mussoorie. Grand temple of Buddha and garden around. You might get to shop some good stuff as well for souvenir.

title: Very good tibetan Buddhist temple...
review: Its a very good tibetan Buddhist temple of lord budha. Amazing architecture of lord buddha i have seen here. Its a very peaceful temple. It has really its amazing beauty.

title: Quiet and green surroundings
review: It is a good Buddhist religious place. If you are not a Buddhist still you will like the temple, its serenity and green surroundings.

title: Mesmerising
review: Buddha temple is one of the most visited places in Dehradun which is located at Clement Town. The monastery was built in 1965 to promote religious and cultural teachings of Buddhism. The aesthetically designed temple proudly displays 103 feet tall statue of Lord Buddha. The temple showcases remarkable Japanese architecture, intricate wall paintings, marvelous architecture and beautifully sculpted idols. The lively paintings which depicts the life cycle of Lord Buddha are the major attraction of this place. These paintings were painted in pure gold color by 50 skillful artists.You can have an enchanting view of the lustrous Doon Valley from the terrace area and feel the fresh breeze gently touching your cheeks. Enjoy shopping at the tiny shops which are present in the temple complex. Few eateries are also available inside the temple complex to savor your jaded palates. It’s a place which can be visited all around the year and even better if you carry a camera along with you.

title: Big Temple
review: Big Temple.. 3 main Area to visit in this temple.. 1. Buddha Statue

title: Place with Peace
review: Good place for having mental peace if you find a break from your work for an afternoon. Architecture are very good, place maintained with care.

title: buddha temple a new experiance
review: we all knows Buddha and visited Bodh gaya but this temple is of Tibbet Budha culture and worship which we knows after Holy Highighness Dalai Lama  take shelter in India after China interference in Tibbet day to day work. Dehradun has a good population of Tibbaties where they build many temple for their worship.A place to visit to get a new experice of a culture which is new to us

title: Peaceful Buddhist temple
review: This is the Sakya Buddhist temple situated in the heart of the city. It is beautifully decorated with fresh flowers and candles with pictures and wall hangings all over the walls

title: nice place
review: It was very crowded on Saturday. But a nice place place to spend a few hours. One can give it a miss if one has been to other buddhist temples.

title: Mindrolling Monastery
review: These very one is believed to be the largest buddhist reliquary in Asia. It has five floors with enshrined statues of Buddha and Guru Padmasambhava; also, features mesmerizing colourful wall paintings. After viewing ornate decorations on three floors of the Buddha Temple, you will reach the open viewing platform on the fourth floor of the temple, which offers a magnificent 360-degree view of the entire Dehradun Valley. The wall paintings in Buddha Temple illustrating the life events of Lord Buddha are simply incomparable. MUST VISIT!!

title: Place of peace and spiritual
review: Buddha temple is located in middle of the city and quite a good place to visit with friends and family. You need to climb too much to reach at the top of the temple and view of the city from top is awesome.

title: Budhist temple
review: Place to visit. the adjacent local market is value add and gives you feel good factor. I would recommend to visit this place and enjoy peace and culture.

title: Good to visit only Sunday
review: Only sunday the upper main temple is open till 6 pm. it is good for 1st visit and entry fee cum shoe rack charge rs.3.

title: Peaceful
review: I visited the temple in June 2016. It is long route from the main city but the ride in enjoyable. The temple is built inside the Tibetan settlement so as soon as you enter the area you see Tibetan shops and homes. We went around 12 PM but the market seem to be closed. But the complex is grand. You can see the Buddha idol from a far distance. As the complex you need to walk a lot. There is greenery all around which is very soothing. It will be more beautiful during monsoons. There strict instructions you need to follow. Shoes are not allowed inside. Also you need to remain quiet so going with kids you need to make sure of that. The main temple looks simple from outside but as you enter you will be surprised with the level of architecture that has been used. Photography is strictly prohibited inside. All around the main dome of temple statues have been placed in symmetry. Also the walls are covered with silk covers with hand work which is extremely beautiful.  You will see monks around the main temple so it is important to remain quiet around them. I enjoyed the place ..you can sit calmly outside between the nature and enjoy with the nature.

title: Peaceful
review: The place is peaceful. Good chance to appreciate the architecture and paintings. Try going on weekdays, since it will be less crowded. Evening time preferred.

title: Worth the visit
review: This monastery is a beautiful place with it world peace stupa and temple. The campus is neat just like any Buddhist temple. Couldn't get glimpse of the sanctum as entry restricted during rain.

title: This is the Mindroling monastery outside Tibet!
review: Mindroling use to be the monastery were the astrologers and doctors which serve at the Potala were teached.

title: refreshes the Bhutan experience.
review: Mindroling Monastery Buddha statue is very famous tourist attraction. It is home to the India's tallest standing Buddha statue. Gleaming in the color of gold, the statue stands 32.6meters or 107ft. The main attraction the is Buddha statue in the complex, with gardens and other Tibetan style buildings. There are also mini shops outside the complex selling typical Tibetan snacks such a thuk pa, momos. For all those who love to shop a lot, there are shops selling the latest trends at a very low price. Dont forget to collect your souvenir form the local shop nearby.

title: Great place
review: A must visit in Dehradun great architecture, beautiful statues, nice ambience, you can feel the peace and holiness of this place

title: place of PEACE and BEAUTY and   C L E A N !!!
review: After all the dirt and dust in Dehradun I found this place to contemplate, to feel quiet and being overwhelmed by it GREAT energy. So different from the Hindu Temples who have no sense for beauty, for HAPPINESS and peace, except the decoration of their GODS. I felt not being aknowledged as a human being there like I felt so incredible deeply touched visiting the Tibetan Buddhist Temple. The garden is a dream. The special pool for the monkeys worth to linger and full of fun watching them. Not to forget the excellent capuccino with an unforgettable brownie in the Cafeteria!

title: Many buddhist temple area
review: Big and nice stupa with nice Lamas doing pujas inside. Very friendly and powerful at the same time. Also many other monasteries around. Nice place for a person who is into budhism and especially tibetan budhism.

title: Buddhist Temple
review: Located very near to Claimant town famous Cantonment area of Dehradun. Big and nice stupa with young lamas doing pujas inside. Away from crowds and traffic of Dehradun Tibetan Buddhist temple, this place is very calm and peaceful and perfect for meditation and great energy. This is awesome place for religious travellers and picnic appraisers. You can easily and comfortably reach this place even in public transport from anywhere in Dehradun.

title: beautiful so peaceful
review: beautiful buddha 35 meters high! amazing and peacful atmosphere..I enjoyed there as a buddhist, i felt really good

title: truly divine
review: the place is beauty in its own... u can feel the peace when u r inside the temple ... definately a visit once to enjoy peace and calm...

title: Beautiful Buddhist temple
review: We visited Dehradun last Nov-Dec and went to this temple. The temple is beautiful and the ambience is very peaceful. The inner walls of the stupa are surrounded by statues of Lord Buddha. There area around the temple is nice to have a relaxing time.

title: This is very nice place to visit.
review: Buildings are very nice. And you will get to know about the buddhist culture and for sure it is a calm place.

title: Mindrolling Tibetan Monastery
review: Inside have the tallest stupa in South East Asia. Big compund, well keep and serene. After visiting the monastery can take a stroll outside the Tibetan colony. Spend 4 hours there, worth visiting.

title: nice and peaceful
review: love to be there....Quite and peaceful ambiance, Temple was not opened but rest of the things were quite mpressive.. there is one warrior statue was in under constructio, if visiting after april, check that as well....

title: Colorful and inspiring
review: I habe been at the temple in daylight and have been impressed how colorful and peacful it was. Very inspiring.

title: Saw the Lama Dance, Amazing!
review: Went in March for a solo visit, spent an hour rolling the wheels and chanting Om Mani Padme Hum. It was very refreshing and calm. Beautiful flowers around.

title: Best Experience to know Buddhism
review: Taking time off my tight official schedule at  Dehradun i preferred to visit this temple on sunday evening which was about 12 plus km from my place pf stay.

title: Peace at mind
review: Well maintained, soul searching experience inside the monastery/temple. Good to understand the culture of the Tibetians.

title: Very quiet and sacred
review: We get a positive energy while visiting this place.It is next to famous sai baba Temple of Dehradun .

title: Happy Valley Monastery
review: The place is quite and peaceful. The view is great and one can spend a lot of time just sitting there and observing...

title: Peaceful and memorable
review: You cannot enter after 5 P.M but once you enter you can leave at any time. I left at 9 latest. You will hardly get any taxi to go back so it is good you arrange for your transport in advance. This temple is at a secluded place. You would love the peace here for sure. A simple walk is great when its done here.

title: Nice place to visit
review: I have visited Budhist temple during my visit to Kempty Falls. It is a very peaceful and nice place to visit. The views are awesome and architecture is great.

title: Another Tourist Attraction
review: Place has nothing great to see. The place has some Tibetian shops selling wares imported from China and nothing unique.

title: Great
review: good place. food nearby is great!! A must try food.. very peacfeul and in harmony with the nature..Got to visit!!

title: good experience
review: we were here for a cultural experience which we enjoyed to the fullest.nice information about buddhist symbols and rituals.a must visit for artefacts lovers.

title: Great place to visit
review: If you know how to go about this place, it's a really interesting place to visit. Here are the tips: 1. When you enter the temple, first turn left and notice the the big incense burner in which the burn green cedar twigs and leaves. 2. Then look right and notice the white board on which is written the meanings of the Budhists famous chant: Om Ma Ni Pad Me Hum. 3. Turn the prayer wheels saying this chant. 4. Go to the room built to light the butter lamps in memory of anyone or anything to whom you wish to dedicate them to. 5. Enter the monastry and pay your obeisance to the Budha. 6. Walk around the tall flag poles and then enter the room of the big prayer wheel. Turn the wheel while chanting Om Ma Ni Pad Me Hum.

title: A very serene place
review: Another outstanding place - absolutely worth a visit while in Dehradun. Great structures built extraordinarily with a wonderful garden in the middle of it. The giant prayer wheels are very interesting, while the silence of this place is definitely very calming for the mind.

title: Work of Art
review: The temple is full of artistic patterns and designs. No internal wall is left blank. All are very colourful and bright depicting the pictures of Budha regime.

title: Peaceful, loved it
review: Temple was peaceful. it was full of Monks and tourists. Public Restrooms were in good condition and we can carry Baby stroller there. Park was beautiful. If you want peace ans stress free time, visit this place.

title: Well worth a visit
review: Visited this temple at the beginning of February and was very impressed. The one large statue of Buddha is still under construction but the main temple was magnificent. It was interesting to be in a temple where the monks are being trained and educated in their religion. The whole complex is very large and the grounds are quite beautiful with lots of flowers and very peaceful.

title: Huge Buddha Statue
review: A Buddhist temple built on a huge area with a huge Buddha statue. Very peaceful place, many people families come there and have a picnic.

title: beautiful temple of budha
review: Best and colourful temple of bhagwan budha ji, it is very neat and clean place and really a stress free area.

title: The Buddhist influence..!
review: All fo a sudden, you feel like yiu're not in Doon anymore. The city in general is just another city, a bustling capital of a state thats not really a metropolitan, but more of a window to other far out destinations to escape. But right here, in the midlle of it all, set in the quaint Clement Town is the Tibetan settlement and their work of art.. Giant stupas, and erections... peaceful atmosphere, and a pretty setting. Its all very calm indeed. Come here without any luggage though, if you really wanna experience the real deal. And make sure you stop by at the restaurant and try out that amazing thukpa...!! :)

title: A Good maintained Spot
review: This is a budhist monastry situated on the outskirts of Dehradun, near Graphic Era University (Past ISBT DDN).

title: Om mani pene hum
review: a lovely place in clement town outside dehradun. great place to relax, get a good vibe n pass the day while the buddhist monks roam around doing their thing! Enjoyed learning more about buddhism and the clean feel to the place!

title: NICE PLACE
review: the place is good,mostly you will find couples inside the garden area, have option for shopping and restro, inside the temple premises,

title: Quaint place
review: Head here if you're looking for a peaceful time. There's something about the area which makes one calm and relaxed. The food inside is ok, there's a little restaurant outside though that serves yummy food, just look around. You can easily spend half a day, take book along and connect to you peaceful side.

title: Superb place, worth spending an evening
review: One of the newest Tibetan temples in India. The paintings and statues with adorn the temple and really beautiful. Do buy things from the shops insice.

title: Very good attraction of Dehradun
review: Lot of Buddhist temple are in Dehradun vicinity. Mussoorie is 35 km from Dehradun and hilly station. Lot of Tibetan are living in Mussoorie itself. So it's place of their worship. As usual anyone can enjoy Tibetan architecture of different place.

title: Evergreen place
review: It's peaceful and clean place. It's god place. If you really wanna visit then please avoid using loud music at temple area and nuns and monks wr praying.

title: Must go place in Dehradun
review: One of the most amazing places within Dehradun. Nice views, open space for kids, nice place to hang out with family.

title: Amazing
review: This is a must do if you're visiting Dehradun. Huge temple that towers over you, some nice shops, and huge grounds to enjoy the peace and tranquility.

title: Feel the Buddha
review: If you are from Thailand or other Asian country , you just tell Auto -Rickshaw to send you to Buddha Temple . This easy-called name is well known among them. I spent 100 rupees from bus station in dehradun to get there....Luckily I could make friend with friendly Lamas before so I stayed a night inside the temple . This temple is surrounded by Tibetan shops ,very clean very colorful. Inside the temple ,there is a very big Buddha statue which is really worth-seeing, very beautiful .Feel  mystic when sitting in front of the big Buddha statue and turn  face upward to see Buddha's face ,especially when having clouds as back ground...wanna go back there again to feel the Buddha ,to feel peaceful atmosphere ..to meet friendly people there.

title: Magical place
review: On of the world peace stupas here in Dehradun... I recommend to visit this place on Sundays, then you can go upstairs to Tara...

title: Pristine and Peaceful
review: This part of Dehradun is called Clement Town. This Tibetan settlement area is like mini Tibet or Ladhak. This temple was built by the Tibetan community in 1965 with the aim to preserve and promote Tibetan culture in India. It’s amazingly clean and beautifully maintained. There are several large prayer wheels on the grounds surrounding the Stupa for use by monks. The temple has beautiful architecture, peaceful atmosphere & impressive interiors. The paintings on the walls are flawless depicts the life of Lord Buddha.

title: Wow, how peaceful
review: Thanks to the beauty and peace in the temple area, you will forget anything bad happened to you...Surroundings is a treat to eyes...Talking to some Tibetian local people out there was a great experience, as they dont know how to talk rudely..So I will request to respect their rules there (like prohibiting photography inside stupa etc. )...I found it most beautiful place in Dehradun...

title: Quiet Place
review: Nice and quiet place,good to visit on sunday as they open the temple also ,surrounded by the forest beautiful view of dehradun from the top of temple.

title: Buddha Temple
review: It gives you a glimpse of the life of Buddha the great. The temple is one of the major tourist attraction of Doon valley and has been beautifully maintained. One can also get a glimpse of Tibetan history & culture.

title: Peaceful, thoughtful, mindful
review: We visited the temple after work and were struck by the difference between the chaos outside and the peace inside. We wandered around the grounds looking at the prayer wheels and stupas at sunset with the Himalayas in the distance.

title: Buddham Saranam ....Peaceful temple on the top of Mussorie hills
review: I have visited this place along with my family during 2014 and Tibetan Buddhist Temple is located on the Mussoorie Hills very near to Dehradun.  The location and the surrounding area is so greenery to stay a while when you are planning to visit Mussoorie.  Do not miss this peaceful place while you are planning to visit Dehradun and is a memorable spot for all peace loving souls.  Making pictures with loved ones here is a lifetime album.  Krishna Duvvuri Abu Dhabi

title: A calm place
review: One can enjoy the calmness and dearness of this place. We were fortunate to see the authentic Tibetan folk dance ritual in this temple during our visit. I would give a 5 on top of 5 to this place because of the peace this temple imparts in one's mind.

title: A beautiful Tibetian monarchy!
review: A must to visit place around Dehradun. The central hall is huge and gorgeous which opens your inner mind and heart. You will forget yourself for a while.

title: Good time-pass place
review: Its a Monastery having a big well decorated garden. The place is famous among the school-college students for time-pass.

title: serene
review: surrounded by tall trees, the place offers a very serene and scenic atmosphere.

title: VERY NICE MONASTERY
review: i like this monastry very much this is worth visit place in dehradun with friends or family so go n see the beauty of this place.

title: Serene & Peaceful
review: Keep time on your hand while visiting this place. Peaceful location. Well maintained. Will like to go back again.

title: Serene, clean, great
review: The Buddhist charm at its best. Great ambience and the feel of spirituality by the monks and the lamas. The mere magnanimity of the temple itself is so mesmerising. For the selfie lovers. Perfect place to be. I loved the place

title: "Really great palace in DOON"
review: Very nice palace to visit with family and get a chance to meet there Buddhist......religions.....

title: “Sublime Inspiration”
review: I really don't like giving a below average rating especially when we really didn't have the proper opportunity to experience what should have been. so i gave an 'average' rating. from my research i expected much more.

title: Best place to see in doon
review: Really great culture of monk and the Buddhist to feel...amazing place...pls don't keep time 12:2 pm because won't experience whole ... One hour or max two hour is enough ... They have restaurant but lunch time that also found close ...

title: a great place to visit in dehradun
review: A good place with culture of monk & Buddhist to see. You will find a very different experience during your visit.

title: They didnt't let me in past noon
review: Tibetan Buddhist Temple is over-rated. Its a normal temple. You might think it ll have a nice view from top may be, but no. Its on a plain road, just on the main road. When I went, the priests did not even let us in in spite of us waiting for long enough and its not that we had gone in noon or midnight. We went in the evening but were not allowed to enter.

title: 'Beautiful place, must visit'
review: It is together with Mindrolling monastery and this place is closed on Monday. Unfortunately we went there o Monday, so cant go inside the temple, but from outside also it is very very beautiful. Outside on the road there are many shops selling Tibetan clothes and their foods. It is a nice experience visiting this place.

title: Heavens Abode
review: The place is so quiet and serene that you can feel God in yourself and a beautiful surroundings makes you feel spiritual and Heavenly.

title: Beautiful & Peaceful location
review: The temple has beautiful architecture (Japanese architecture style) ,peaceful atmosphere,& impressive interiors.The wall paintings are mesmerizing & depicts the life of Lord Buddha.The temple was built by the Tibetan community in 1965 with the aim to preserve and promote Tibetan culture in India.Majority of the people residing in near by area & shop/eateries owners are from Tibetan community.

title: A peaceful and beautiful place
review: The temple is located at a very peaceful place with beautiful architecture. The designs of the walls are outstanding.If you see them then you will not close your eyes for a second.I felt very good and peace there.the statue of lord Buddha on the gate is best there.

title: Beautiful and Spiritual
review: Must see! The vibe is amazing. It is a nice place to go and relax on the grass. The art is so detailed and mind blowing.

title: Calm and photogenic
review: If you love crowds Sunday is the best, otherwise a peaceful place with less crowd in other days.

title: A visit by bike
review: Awesome place, must visit. Have a little walk around and spend quality time of at least two hours to relax. Bring DSLR for photography, you shall not be disappointed.

title: Peaceful and pure!
review: Its a very peaceful and pure place...nice one to get insight into tibetan culture.momos around the place are yummy....nice garden and well maintained...

title: One of the best place in Dehradun
review: Beautiful Monastery & Stupa of Gautam Buddha.

title: Serene oasis
review: Officially named Mindrolling Monastery.

title: peaceful
review: Buddha Temple is one such place in Dehradun that is visited by hundreds of people every day. This important landmark of Dehradun is famed for its impressive architecture, beautiful interiors, decorations, and appealing surroundings. The wall paintings in Buddha Temple illustrating the life events of Lord Buddha are simply incomparable.

title: At peace
review: You can actually spend hours in the peaceful environ. They also have a cafetaria to fulfill the hunger pangs , once you feel the spiritual thirst is quenched.

title: Awesome
review: magnificent place with a wonderful marketplace. Can enjoy and hangout and have fun with friends and family.

title: You must visit this peaceful place
review: I  must say that this is an amazing Buddhist temple. Its not a typical tourist place and hence you will not find it crowded. You need your own vehicle to reach here and you ill be passing through cantonment area. When we went there the road of about 6 km was very bad.

title: Heaven for God Lover
review: The place is quiet peaceful, near the cant area and close to ISBT. The place must be visited on Sunday, as crowd will be available only on sunday.

title: Near the FRRI & cantonment area
review: This Tibetan Buddhist temple is very well established and mirrors a Tibetan monastery and gives us a wonderful visit experience. Location is also peaceful and its open to people of all religions. The murals and paintings depiction the timeline of Buddha was also informative. Overall must visit for a different spiritual experience.

title: Beauty,calm,peace of mind
review: The gumpha is about 12 km away from clock tower and 4 km from ISBT.It has a 60 feet high statue of Lord Buddha,the highest in Asia.The lush green lawns and temple with murals and peaceful surroundings are worth visiting.The vegetarian momos are awesome...

title: Must visit if going to Dehradun or Mussoorie
review: Clean, Beautiful, well maintained (Washrooms were very stinky though)....World's largest Stupa - inside Stupa so many statues of buddha, Large Buddha Statue....amazing place.....

title: Must visit during Dehradun trip
review: We visited this place during our trip to dehradun and its located in the buddhist populated area where tibeten refugee are staying. Their are some good restaurant around this place for authentic tibeten food and the statue of buddha inside this temple is huge and the atmosphere is serene

title: Peaceful place
review: A very peaceful and quiet place to visit and spend some time with yourself. The place is as good as visiting like any other Buddhist places in hills and is quite peaceful. I always enjoys visiting this place.

title: Little Disappointed
review: This is a bit on the smaller side when it comes to Buddhist temples. The wall paintings were just brilliants as is the case in almost all such temples. The large standing Buddha statue nearby is quite nice.

title: Good place to visit.
review: Hi

title: Awesome
review: This place is just awesome. Beautiful carving and structure design. It's a very good place and you are lucky to go here if you are photo fanatic. Yummy yummy super yyummy  dimsems served around before entering.

title: Worth a visit
review: Spectacular architecture and near the army camp where Henrich was kept before he escaped to TIbet and wrote 7 years in Tibet

title: Peace of Mind
review: The place is so beautiful and peaceful. Situated at a small hill top away from city traffic. There are several large prayer wheels on the grounds surrounding the Stupa for use by monks and laity. In the Buddha garden, the huge standing Buddha keeps a watchful eye, surrounded by a fence holding dozens more large prayer wheels.

title: Calm & Quiet
review: Well maintained and very cleaned area with good lawn, anyone can go there for refreshment with family after a busy week

title: Peace of mind
review: This part of dehradun is called clement town... A tibetan settlement area. As soon as u enter the gate, it's like a different place altogether.... They have kept is so clean n proper. You will several monasteries to visit n nice gardens to relax. The hotels are so cheap here. We took a room for 400rs. 2/3 days trip is perfect.

title: Peaceful
review: Really liked the place ... It was peaceful. Its just you and slow recital of some buddhist verses ... in one word Magical

title: peaceful!!
review: Whenever i visit to Dehradun, i make sure i visit to the Buddha monestry, the reason being the best momos being served around the monestry and the  peaceful environment here..very nice place with amazing availability of Tibetian food around. Must visit!!

title: must visit
review: excellent temple and a must visit ...will be happy to see the diversity in india and their traditions being followed..felt very happy to see such a beautiful place

title: Peace, Serine
review: It's situated outside the bustling city amongst a Tibetan settlement which is very peaceful, serine and huge

title: green and peaceful
review: Huge sprawling campus, this place is one of the best Buddhist temples I have visited. Reminds of the temples of Thailand, but more peaceful. Splendid architecture, riot of colours, well manicured lawns and spic and span campus. A must visit when in Dehradun. Souvenir shops and restaurants present in the campus.

title: Evening Fun
review: Really ds place is for college going kids.. as it now days more of love meeting spot.. to be honest.

title: Peace and quiet
review: It was a nice place to visit as a casual tourist. Children leant about Buddhism and appreciated the colors. it was walking distance from our hotel so it felt like a nice place to see.

title: My kinda place....
review: Well I literally live here and to be honest this is the one of the best public places with 3 different Tibetan Monasteries, Tibetan restaurant and dozens of guest houses and gift items shop with a most cleanest Public area in the city of Dehra Dun... If you haven't been here you must visit it once... And foreigner are not allowed to spend the night inside the Tibetan Settlement due to restriction from the centre govt..... Other than that you are most welcome and enjoy the place anytime you like.... Or get in touch with me for any suggestion for this place or the whole Dehra Dun.... Peace

title: good place to go
review: It is a good Buddhist temple, huge sprawling campus. the atmosphere is calm and serene.The garden is well maintained. The view from the terrace which is open on every Sunday is awesome.A must visit for every tourist.

title: Serene
review: Vrilliantly made and well maintained. Gives good insights into buddhist culture and Tibetan architecture. Located away from the hustle and bustle of the city, a good getaway

title: fantastic place
review: It is fantastic Simply, although i have been here for more than 50 times. Its a altogether a different feel, Tibetan culture, food, gifts, items. A must visit place if you haven't been to a monastery before

title: indescribably beautiful
review: Totally excellent. Try to have enough time to both look at the magnificence of the decoration and to sit for a while and melt in the peace of the place. So great!

title: good to view, and average place
review: nothing so special,,, just temple and some open space.

title: Must see
review: This is a must see if you are in the area, the people are nice and the temple is beautiful. Make sure to go in to all of them and not just the main one. Walk around the grounds a little to see more. The shops just outside the temple across the street are very reasonably priced.

title: superb place
review: Totally excellent. Try to have enough time to both look at the magnificence of the decoration and to sit for a while and melt in the peace of the place. So great!

title: Nice place in Tibetan Community
review: Visited the temple with family and kids. The approach to the temple area is through a small market lane, being run by the Tibetan Community. The temple area is quite spacious and kids loved running and playing in the well maintained lawns. However the attached toilet facility smelled like anything and we literally had to look for a corner to settle down. I even liked exploring the Tibetan eateries in the market area selling some Indo-chinese stuff although I would have loved to eat an authentic Tibetan Meal.

title: Nice place
review: Must see of dehradun,its a calm and nice place.The road is a pain but worth it.The Buddha statue is large and nice to take a pic.

title: Nice Peaceful Place
review: The place I found to be typical Monastery of Buddhist style similar to Leh and Sikkim or Bhutan. The place is peaceful and close to the nature. It has a Huge temple, a cafe, and a sprawling garden. The approach to the place is from small by lanes. It has Parking Space. Monkey Menace Exists. Must carry your water, and some eatables in the car. The place is in the outskirts of the Doon Valley enroute to Delhi, so its better to enjoy the place once you are moving out of the town.

title: definitely a skip
review: not too much to see and not worth going all the way, i would suggest give this one a skip, lots of better things to do in dehradun. too far to go too less to see, nothing that u would have not seen before.

title: a peaceful place
review: I am happy that I took the time to visit, it was a peaceful afternoon break from the hectic pace of Dehradun. The temple & the area around the temple( Clementown) are clean, quiet, & very well maintained.

title: Wonderful place to visit
review: We really enjoyed the visit to the temple and the walk around it.  beautifully built and you feel a sense of calmness visiting the place.  The walk around the neighborhood was also wonderful and a place to learn the Tibetian culture and food.

title: Peaceful location
review: A beautiful place - Have visited four times now and on each occasion seen something new. Friendly community and worth visiting both sides of this location.

title: Buddhist Stupa in serene and tranquil environment
review: This Buddhist stupa in in clement town near to Air Force selection Board. The place is very serene and beautiful. It has a big Stupa dedicated to lord Buddha, a beautiful and picturesque garden with hymns playing out in the background. The place also has shops , but from travelers point of view this place is for relaxing and eating momos and thukpa available at near by shops. Do visit and spend some quality time away from maddening city crowd.

title: Buddhist temple style is exactly reflected
review: It is a worth visiting and perfect place for people who are interested in Tibetan / Buddhist architecture.

title: calm & beautiful surroundings
review: Nice place to visit. Peaceful surroundings...beautiful forest nearby...interior of the temple is very good. Overall nice place to spend an evening with family.

title: Peaceful Place
review: What a great place to be in. This is a wonderful calm n peaceful place in the woods of dehradun. Have been visiting this place since last 7-10 years and always awestruck with the simplicity and the beauty.

title: Amazing Monk
review: I met this monk there, I think they are quiet friendly. When you reach this temple, the serenity might just make you relaxed. The big buddha idol is a good work of art. You can find the monks friendly and it is advisable to talk to them to know their lifestyle and about them.

title: Tibetian Buddhist Temple, Dehradun
review: A clean & peaceful retreat reflecting the sanctity, peace & simplicity of Buddhist ideology.

title: a temple to see as you go to see sleeping buddha in singapore
review: paid shoes keepin service is my dislike  do not go there arond 1.00 pm to 3.00pm as all the market around is closed

title: Tibetan Disney-Land
review: If for one or the other reason you have to visit Derhadun you can go and see the Tibetan Monastery and Stupa. It is near Graphic Erea University (Clement Town). The park and the buildings are quite nice, it feels however as if it is a part of  Disney-Land. The constructions look very much like imitations of Tibetan architecture. The authentic Tibetan feeling (that you may pick up at Bodnath (Kathmandu) or McLeod Ganj (Dharamsala) is not there. The park has more boards that tell you what you should do or not do than stupas. (So if you have children that want to run around or if you want to hold hands with your girlfriend you will not be welcome there.)

title: Buddha town in Uttarakhand
review: This is a vast Buddha temple and it takes you back to Tibet. For a moment, You feel as if you are probably in Tibet. Large temples, with Dalali Lamas old and young all over the place. The silence of temple helps you in Meditation

title: Stunning !!
review: A must visit. Beautiful architecture, serene environment to sit quietly for hours. I absolutely love this temple for the simplicity and humbleness.

title: very lovely structure
review: liked the structure and the way the boards were put up with a lot of information but there was no place to get some guidance or someone who could show around and very unfriendly staff at the showrooms inside which spoils such a beautiful monument that signifies peace and love and kindness

title: Great Place...
review: Any visitor to Dehradun must visit this place....even if he/she has time to visit only one place....

title: Peaceful  pleasant andenlighten place
review: Excellent and well maintained place as if one feels in heavenly abode. The environment is excellent with garden all around with Budhas statue over looking with closed eyes yet smiling all around. Many incarnations of the Lord gives insight into many issues

title: Spiritual & Placid Place
review: A must visit place in Dehradun....now it's open on all days for visitors....it's similar to Buddha Temples in Australia & New Zealand but the quality  & variety of food in restaurant is not so good.

title: Buddha temple, Clement Town, Dehradun
review: Impressive architecture, there is a peaceful and serene atmosphere about the place, The wall painings inside the stupa are marvellous and depict incidents from buddhist mythology.

title: its really awesome, feels like in the thailand
review: its really great to visited tibetan buddist temple, as you enter this temple you will find lots of information about the temple with design.

title: Spiritual beauty..
review: This is definitely a must see.  Parking is a little tough.  The view from the top is breathtaking. The statues and paintings are unreal!  Thank you to my Indian friends for sharing this experience with me!

title: Place for peace of mind
review: I visited this temple a few years ago. It was so peaceful!! Best thing that I appreciate about this temple was its cleanliness that is normally not seen in most Indian places of worship.i strongly recommend a visit to this place to forget the tension of daily life.

title: Great tourist highlight..
review: A wonderful sight in Dehradun which highlights the Buddhist culture to a favourable extent.

title: Beautiful pagoda
review: The beauty of the temple with landscaped surrounding is too enchanting to give it a miss . The huge statue of Lord Buddha is just fascinating.

title: worth seeing
review: Tibetan Buddha Temple at Dehradun a little far from the main city but is worth seeing

title: excellent place
review: the tibetian restaurant provides delicious food - though the service is terrible, very calm place , relaxing

title: peace
review: It has is the home of his holiness the the Dalai Lama, you have to go and visit it for the serenity.

title: Must visit Place
review: If you are Going Dehradun then you must go to this place. It's like a heaven on heaven on earth. It's open only on Sunday for outsiders. So be sure about your day of visit.

title: Very nice peaceful place
review: Its very nice peaceful Tibetan monastery. Weather you are a Buddhist or not its a must visit place. Its peaceful and religious. Big statue of Lord Buddha and nice art and painting on monastery walls. A good place to interact with Tibetan community..

title: Calm, quiet, clean worship place
review: Excellent temple. All good arrangements for visitors. Must visit place. You can take photos outside the temple but not inside.

title: Really a spritual spot.
review: This is a recent addition to the attractions at Dehradun,It has been developed with the help og Genmam people .I liked World Peace Stupa and The Buddha Statue very much .To sit and pray for just 5 minutes or so gives abundance of peace .

title: Good and peaceful place
review: Temple is situated near Graphic Era University and is a large temple. Very serene and very relaxing place, one can easily meditate. Interior of the temple is very nice. Thukpa and Momos at nearby street food is very good.

title: monastery
review: this is located in clement town about a km inside from main sahranpur highway. the access is through cant area. this monastery is located inside the Tibetan colony and adjoining Rajaji national park. the area is clean and well maintained with lawn. entry is free. A mini shopping arcade inside the complex sell many Tibetan articles. Inside the Tibetan colony there are many small and clean restaurants catering Tibetan foods.   overall a nice place to spend a couple of hours. This also gives a fair idea about Tibetan people, their culture and religious ( budhist ) belief.

title: Nice temple in a park to walk easy through
review: The temple is located with an impressive statue of the god of rain (Indra) in a park close to the city center. The temple is a part of the monastery and you see the monks passing by. But you can not enter the inner monastery where they are living. It is not an impressive temple, but Dehradun is small and the temple size correlates perfectly with. Visiting time is approximately 1 h. Visiting the shop nearby is not really worth.

title: Refreshing and peaceful place
review: Nice peaceful abode.The nature and the temple soothes the soul mind and your body.Very nicely developed and maintained.The shops around the place are worth visiting.The food and snacks are good.Lively yet peaceful place.

title: Nice and lovely place
review: This is located in Clement Town area of Dehradun near to ISBT Dehradun. It is nice lovely place and worship place of Tibetian people. It is a three storey temple with photos of Lord Buddha. There is also a buddhist school on other side of temple. Park on front of temple is well maintained.

title: Good place to visit
review: This is good place to visit in Dehradoon. We get peace while remaining in temple.One should visit this temple

title: Serene... Nice
review: Ideal location for a peaceful temple. Beautiful, nice but don't go without a fixed vehicle. You'll have no vehicle to go by. Go only if you like Buddhist temple...

title: Very Lovely Place
review: Go to this temple for peace of mind and happiness. This is very beautiful. This lovely temple becomes known once in its entire life.

title: One time
review: It's very nice peaceful place,we have visited there before 3 days with 4 family, it's a very big temple, around the temple it's a huge neat and clean lawn,i felt there sense of mental peace,kids also enjoyed there a lot

title: Serene place
review: one of the off beat places amongst an area largely inhabited by Tibetan refugees, the temple is very charming and tranquil. its located on the other side of the airport almost a journey for 45 mins, hence if its not in your route, you might want to skip it. but if you have the time then will definitely recommend a visit.

title: Good and peaceful place
review: Temple is situated near Graphic Era University and is a large temple. Very serene and very relaxing place, one can easily meditate. Interior of the temple is very nice. Thukpa and Momos at nearby street food is very good.

A mini shopping arcade inside the complex sell many Tibetan articles. Inside the Tibetan colony there are many small and clean restaurants catering Tibetan foods.   overall a nice place to spend a couple of hours. This also gives a fair idea about Tibetan people, their culture and religious ( budhist ) belief.

Visiting time is approximately 1 h. Visiting the shop nearby is not really worth.

review: This is good place to visit in Dehradoon. We get peace while remaining in temple.One should visit this temple
